medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute abdominal pain with radiation to the back, nausea, and emesis following ERCP.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports the onset of acute abdominal pain at approximately 3pm, about 2 hours after the ERCP procedure, which also involved episodes of nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Coronary Artery Disease. 2. Hypertension. 3. Hypothyroidism. 4. Breast cancer with local excision. 5. Previous alcohol abuse.
medical_history.family_history: Both of her parents have heart disease, as do her brother and sister. No family history of GI illnesses.
